text: فَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِفَ وَعۡدِهِۦ رُسُلَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٞ ذُو ٱنتِقَامٖ

translation.en: So never think that Allah will fail in His promise to His messengers. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution
translation.id: Maka karena itu, jangan sekali-kali kamu mengira bahwa Allah mengingkari janji-Nya kepada rasul-rasul-Nya! Sungguh, Allah Mahaperkasa dan mempunyai pembalasan
